column4: Is there some way I can capture the file from mms://win.playstream.com/stanthony/windowsmedia/SOD/1429.wma ?
There are two of these files I'd like to save.
only the first initial user has 'sudo' rights.
As far as I know, this one is.  At any rate, I just checked and the user is in admin group
What other issue should I look for?
not sure. ive never had the problem except when using  a different user.
Yes, it is.  I set this up for a young man some time ago and he's somehow mucked it up.  Do not know what he's done.
could be the users groups, or the sudoers file i guess..
heres my groups (well part of it) file --> grep willis /etc/group | pastebinit
i think those are untweaked by me.. :) i dont recall tweaking them
